titles.title: 787 Wonderful Words Of Life (easy sweet song)

properties.copyright: Â© Words: Public Domain Music: Public Domain

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Sing them over again to me
Wonderful words of life
Let me more of their beauty see
Wonderful words of life
Words of life and beauty
Teach me faith and duty

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Beautiful words wonderful words
Wonderful words of life
Beautiful words wonderful words
Wonderful words of life

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Christ the blessed One gives to all
Wonderful words of life
Sinner list to the loving call
Wonderful words of life
All so freely given
Wooing us to Heaven

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Sweetly echo the gospel call
Wonderful words of life
Offer pardon and peace to all
Wonderful words of life
Jesus only Savior
Sanctify forever
